definition:
A left (right) module $M$ over a ring $R$ is *Hopfian* if every
surjective $R$-endomorphism of $M$ is an automorphism. Dually, a left
(right) $R$-module $M$ is *cohopfian* if every injective
$R$-endomorphism of $M$ is an automorphism.

[8]{} T. Y. Lam, [*Lectures on Modules and Rings*]{}, Springer-Verlag,
New York (1999).
